means: 敢说，八成儿( bet的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The betting is that the experience will make Japan more competitive still.
sentence.Network_cn: 这场经历很有可能使日本更具竞争力。

sentence.Network_en: I thought nothing of betting £1,000 on a horse.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为把1,000英镑押在一匹马身上没什么了不起。

sentence.Network_en: If you are only betting two dollars, I'll book you myself.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你只下两元赌注, 我可以和你赌.

lj.lj_ly: the betting is that the company will slash the dividend.
lj.lj_ls: 公司很可能会大幅减发股息。

jx.jx_en_mean: likely (or unlikely) to be among the winners of a horse race and given appropriate odds
jx.jx_cn_mean: 赛马可能（或不可能）获胜并赢得赌注

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit. informal)used to express a belief that something is likely

lj.lj_ly: what's the betting he's up to no good?.
lj.lj_ls: 他很可能在搞什么鬼名堂。

entry.def: If you say the betting is that something will happen or is true, you are suggesting that it is very likely to happen or to be true.

example.ex: The betting is that the experience will make Japan more competitive still.
example.tran: 这场经历很有可能使日本更具竞争力。

means.word_mean: 1. preoccupied with the pursuit of pleasure and especially games of chance;
